content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: matches_regex
      value: ^(.){21,}$
Core:
  Id: CORE-000010
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify ARMCD value length is <= 20
Outcome:
  Message: ARMCD value length is greater than 20
  Output Variables:
    - ARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0153
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters and does not have
                  the character restrictions that apply to --TESTCD
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM
      - TA

Outcome.Message: ARMCD value length is greater than 20

Citations.Cited_Guidance: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters and does not have the character restrictions that apply to --TESTCD
